devdoc.details: A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a cliff and vesting period. Optionally revocable by the owner.

_releasableAmount(address).details: Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested

constructor.details: Creates a vesting contract that vests its balance of any ERC20 token to the beneficiary, gradually in a linear fashion until start + duration. By then all of the balance will have vested.

params.beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred
params.cliffDuration: duration in seconds of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest
params.duration: duration in seconds of the period in which the tokens will vest
params.revocable: whether the vesting is revocable or not
params.start: the time (as Unix time) at which point vesting starts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: TokenVesting

revoke(address).notice: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.
